devdoc.details: Contracts relying on this library must initialize GeodeUtils.UniverseALL "fee" variables are limited by FEE_DENOMINATOR = 100%Admin functions are already protected. Note that this library contains both functions called by users(ID) and admins(GOVERNANCE, SENATE ) Note refer to DataStoreUtils before reviewing

approveProposal(GeodeUtils.Universe stor.details: Senate should not be able to approve expired proposalsSenate should not be able to approve SENATE proposals :)

params.id: given ID proposal that has been approved by Senate

approveSenate(GeodeUtils.Universe storag.details: pins id as "voted" when approvedincreases "approvalCount" of proposalId by 1 when approved

params.electorId: should have the voting rights, msg.sender should be the CONTROLLER of given ID

changeIdCONTROLLER(DataStoreUtils.DataSt.details: this operation can not be reverted by old CONTROLLERin case the current controller wants to remove the  need to upgrade to NO Controller they should provide smt like 0x0..dead

returns._0: the expiration date of current SENATE as a timestamp
True if it is allowed by senate and false if not.

newProposal(GeodeUtils.Universe storage,.details: refer to structure of Proposal for explanations of params

setElectorType(GeodeUtils.Universe stora.details: can not set with the same value again, preventing double increment/decrements

params._isElector: true if selected _type can vote for senate from now on

setMaxOperationFee(GeodeUtils.Universe s.details: can not set a fee more than FEE_DENOMINATOR (100%)

returns._0: true if the operation was succesful

setOperationFee(GeodeUtils.Universe stor.details: can not set a fee more than MAXno need to check FEE_DENOMINATOR

returns._0: true if the operation was succesful, might be helpful when governance rights are distributed

devdoc.title: GeodeUtils library

approveProposal(GeodeUtils.Universe stor.notice: type specific changes for reserved_types(1,2,3) are implemented here,  any other addition should take place in Portal, as not related

approveSenate(GeodeUtils.Universe storag.notice: Proposed CONTROLLER is the new Senate after 2/3 of the electors are approved NOTE mathematically, min 4 elector is needed for (c+1)*2/3 to work properlyid can not vote if: - approved already - not its type is not elector - not proposal is expired - not senate proposal

changeIdCONTROLLER(DataStoreUtils.DataSt.notice: only the current CONTROLLER can change

getOperationFee(GeodeUtils.Universe stor.notice: MAX_OPERATION_FEE must limit OPERATION_FEE even if MAX is changed

isUpgradeAllowed(GeodeUtils.Universe sto.notice: Get if it is allowed to change a specific contract with the current version.

newProposal(GeodeUtils.Universe storage,.notice: to ensure the flexibility of Governance-less upgrades in the future, Anyone can create a Proposal.a proposal can be overriden if: expired OR approved. DATASTORE(id) will not be overriden until the proposal is approved.

setElectorType(GeodeUtils.Universe stora.notice: only selected types can vote for senate

userdoc.notice: Exclusively contains functions responsible for administration of Geode Portal, including functions related to "limited upgradability" with Senate & proposals.
